Hello All, 

   I stumbled onto NEAT a short time ago, and I think its an a=
mazing 
piece of work - I'm not an expert on ANN's / Genetic Algorithms by =

any means, but decided to play around with NEAT because I have always 
bee=
n fascinated by the subjects.  I have a few questions that might 
help me g=
et started.

1.  I've looked around for documentation for NEAT, I see a lot=
 of 
papers on "http://nn.cs.utexas.edu/pub-list.php" but they all seem 
ve=
ry experiment specific.  Is there a paper anywhere describing NEAT 
in gene=
ral, and the theory behind how it works?

2.  I looked at the experiments t=
hat come bundled with SharpNeat, and 
I see I have to define a function tha=
t returns fitness in Network 
Evaluator Function to do my own experiment.  =
How do I set a fitness 
threshold to the program, so that SharpNeatGui will=
 know to stop when 
it has found a network of sufficient performance? 

3. =
 Can I setup SharpNeat to only evolve the topology of a network, 
and deter=
mine the weights with traditional back prop ANN training?

Thank You - 
Mik=
e
